citations.desc: Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:55AM on
8/15/2023.
I knocked on the door and then called the number on file which the phone service said has been disconnected. When
back at my vehicle an individual arrived and parked in the driveway. The person said that the licensee has moved to
another state and donated out their animals prior to moving. The individual said that they would not have any updated
contact information and are unable to contact the licensee.
Note: Please contact our main office (970-494-7478) to update your license status.
End Section

narrative:
2.126(b)  Repeat
   
Access and inspection of records and property; submission of itineraries. 
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:55AM on 
8/15/2023.  
 
I knocked on the door and then called the number on file which the phone service said has been disconnected. When 
back at my vehicle an individual arrived and parked in the driveway. The person said that the licensee has moved to 
another state and donated out their animals prior to moving. The individual said that they would not have any updated 
contact information and are unable to contact the licensee. 
 
Note: Please contact our main office (970-494-7478) to update your license status. 
 
 
End Section
